name: Step 1: Join Our Online Classroom
description: Your membership includes access to the private online ZTM community classroom on Discord. You'll join thousands of students of all levels and backgrounds who are learning together and working together to achieve their goals and advance their careers.

name: Step 2: Choose Your Career Path
description: No matter your background or experience, we give you the exact steps to get hired in your dream career, this year. And weâ€™ll guide you every step of the way.

name: Step 3: Check Your ZTM Passport
description: Track your learning streaks and collect badges to show off your new skills. Exclusive for ZTM Academy students.

name: Step 4: Goal Setting for Your Career: Future-Proof Yourself
description: A 5 year framework for planning your future and ensuring you achieve all of your career and life goals.

name: Complete Python Developer in 2024: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn Python from scratch, get hired, and have fun along the way with the most modern, up-to-date Python course on the web.

name: Complete A.I. Machine Learning and Data Science: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn Machine Learning (Artificial Intelligence), Python, Data Science, Data Analysis, Tensorflow, Pandas & more!

name: Complete Web Developer in 2024: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn to code from scratch and get hired as a Web Developer in 2024. This full-stack coding bootcamp will teach you HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Machine Learning & more.

name: Prompt Engineering Bootcamp (Working With LLMs): Zero to Mastery
description: Stop memorizing random prompts. Instead, learn how Large Language Models (LLMs) actually work and how to use them effectively. This course will take you from beginner to mastering LLMs and creating your own AI tools.

name: The Automation Bootcamp (Work Smarter!): Zero to Mastery
description: Go from absolute beginner to a master at automation. Build fun projects that teach you how to automate your work and life so you can work smarter, not harder!

name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn AWS from scratch, from an industry expert. You'll learn AWS fundamentals all the way to advanced cloud technologies, so that you'll be able to ace the certification exam and get hired as a Cloud Engineer!

name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn AWS from an industry expert. You'll learn AWS fundamentals all the way to advanced cloud technologies so that you'll be able to ace the solutions architect certification exam and get hired as a Cloud Architect!

name: The Complete Junior to Senior Web Developer Roadmap (2024)
description: Go from Junior Developer to Senior Developer. Learn all the technical and non-technical skills you need to become a Senior Web Developer in 2024!

name: Master the Coding Interview: Data Structures + Algorithms
description: The ultimate coding interview bootcamp to ace your coding interviews and land your dream job. Learn data structures & algorithms and the exact steps to take to get more interviews, more job offers, and a higher salary.

name: Complete Web & Mobile Designer in 2024: UI/UX, Figma + more
description: Go from complete beginner to getting hired as a Designer in 2024! This is the only design bootcamp you need to learn and master web design, mobile design, Figma, UI & UX, and HTML + CSS.

name: Master the Coding Interview: Big Tech (FAANG) Interviews
description: Get hired at top tech companies (Google, Amazon, Apple + more)! The only FAANG interview prep course you need to ace the coding interview and get hired at the company of your dreams.

name: Master the Coding Interview: System Design + Architecture
description: Become a Senior Engineer. Learn the systems and architecture of web applications. Understand the technologies and trade-offs needed to design the right system.

name: Complete React Developer in 2024 (w/ Redux, Hooks, GraphQL): Zero to Mastery
description: Learn React.js from two industry experts. The only React JS bootcamp course you need to learn React, build large-scale apps from scratch, and get hired as a React Developer. Go from Zero to React Mastery.

name: The CSS Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn everything from CSS basics to advanced CSS techniques by completing 100+ exercises and projects that will wow users and prospective employers. Become a CSS Pro and never create an ugly website again.

name: TensorFlow for Deep Learning Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn TensorFlow. Get Hired. This course will take you from a beginner to a TensorFlow and Deep Learning Expert.

name: PyTorch for Deep Learning Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn PyTorch. Become a Deep Learning Engineer. Get Hired. This PyTorch course is your step-by-step guide to developing your own deep learning models using PyTorch.

name: JavaScript: The Advanced Concepts
description: Learn modern, advanced JavaScript practices to become a top 10% JavaScript Developer. Fun fact: this course is even used as a reference for some FAANG company interview processes.

name: Java Programming Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn Java from scratch. The only Java course you need to go from complete beginner to learning Java from scratch (fundamentals all the way to advanced skills) and being able to get hired as a Backend Developer!

name: Go Programming (Golang): The Complete Developer's Guide
description: Learn Golang from scratch, from an industry expert. Build real-world apps. You'll learn Go fundamentals all the way to advanced concurrency so that you go from beginner to being able to get hired as a Go Developer!

name: Rust Programming: The Complete Developer's Guide
description: Learn the Rust programming language from scratch! Learn how to code & build real-world applications using Rust so that you can get hired as a top programmer. No experience needed.

description: Learn C#/.NET, among the most popular and in-demand coding tools. Learn to build applications for web, mobile, IoT, and gaming. No previous experience needed.

description: Learn Ethical Hacking and Penetration Testing from scratch and master the most modern ethical hacking tools and best practices for 2024!

description: This DevOps Bootcamp will take you from an absolute beginner in Linux to getting hired as a confident and effective Linux Sysadmin.

name: Complete Cybersecurity Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Go from zero to hired as a Cyber Security Engineer. Learn the latest cybersecurity best practices, techniques, and tools so that you can build and defend your digital assets against hackers.

name: The Networking Bootcamp (CompTIA Network+ Certification)
description: Go from complete beginner to acing the globally-recognized CompTIA Network+ certification exam. You'll learn the latest networking best practices, techniques, and tools.

description: Go from complete beginner to acing the globally-recognized CompTIA Security+ certification exam. You'll learn the latest cybersecurity best practices, techniques, and tools.

name: Web Security & Bug Bounty: Learn Penetration Testing

description: Learn Node.js from two industry experts. The only Node JS course you need to learn Node, build large-scale apps from scratch, and get hired as a Backend Developer or Node JS Developer. Go from Zero to Node Mastery.

name: PHP Development Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: This is the only PHP course you need to go from complete beginner to coding your own PHP applications!

name: Django Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn Django from an industry expert. You'll learn Django fundamentals all the way to advanced skills while building real-world apps so that you can go from beginner to being able to get hired as a Django Developer!

description: This SQL Bootcamp will teach you SQL, database management, and database design using real-world exercises working with all database types. No experience needed.

name: Unity Bootcamp: 3D Game Development
description: This is the only Unity course you need to go from complete beginner (no coding experience) to coding your own 3D games and getting hired as a Game Developer this year!

name: Three.js Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn Three.js from scratch and build your own 3D interactive portfolio. This course is for developers serious about taking their coding skills and career to the next level.

name: Motion Design with Figma: Animations, Motion Graphics, UX/UI
description: Learn motion design using Figma from a design industry pro. This projects-based course will teach you how to use motion to take your designs (and portfolio) to the next level.

name: TypeScript Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn TypeScript from scratch by building your own real-world apps. This course is for developers serious about taking their coding skills and career to the next level.

description: Get hired or your first client by building your dream portfolio of modern, real-world JavaScript projects. Never spend time on confusing, out of date, incomplete tutorials anymore!

name: Remix Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn Remix from scratch and build better websites. This course is for Web Developers serious about taking their coding skills and career to the next level.

name: Complete Next.js Developer: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn Next JS from experts. The only Next JS course you need to learn Next JS, build large-scale apps (like Netflix!) from scratch and get hired as a Next.js Developer in 2024.

description: The only Vue.js tutorial + projects course you need to learn Vue (including all new Vue 3 features), build large-scale Vue applications from scratch & get hired as a Vue Developer in 2024. Go from zero to Vue Mastery.

name: Complete Angular Developer in 2024: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn Python from scratch, get hired, and have fun along the way with the most modern, up-to-date Python course on the web.

name: Flutter Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Learn Flutter from an industry expert. The only Flutter course you need to go from complete beginner to developing iOS and Android apps with Flutter to being able to get hired as a Mobile App Developer!

name: Dart: The Complete Developer's Guide
description: Learn Dart programming in depth from an actual Google Developer Expert. This is the only Dart tutorial + projects course you need to learn Dart and build real-world native applications from scratch.

description: The only React Native course you need to learn React Native, build large-scale React Native iOS + Android apps from scratch and get hired as a Mobile App Developer in 2024.

name: Web3 Masterclass: Blockchain, DApps, DAOs + More
description: Learn all about web3, the future of the web! This course will get you up to speed on everything you need to know about web3 including topics like Blockchain, Cryptocurrencies, Smart Contracts, DApps, DAOs, NFTs, + more.

name: Solidity, Ethereum and Blockchain: The Complete Developer's Guide
description: Learn Solidity from scratch with this Blockchain Developer Bootcamp. You'll go from beginner to building your own web3 projects and getting hired as a Blockchain Developer.

name: Statistics Bootcamp (with Python): Zero to Mastery
description: Learn Statistics from an industry expert. With more than 24 projects, quizzes, tests, and challenges, and utilizing ChatGPT to work with data more effectively, this is the perfect hands-on course to launch your career.

name: Business Analytics Bootcamp (with Python): Zero to Mastery
description: Learn Business Data Analytics from an industry expert by using Python, real-world datasets and cutting edge tools. Learn everything from the fundamentals to expert techniques to get hired as a Business Data Analyst!

name: Time Series Forecasting with Python
description: This project-based course will teach you how to build a tool that predicts demand for Airbnb properties in New York and become a Business Data Analyst.

name: Power BI Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Go from absolute beginner in Power BI to getting hired as a confident and effective Analyst. Learn Power BI (+ much more) by analyzing real-world datasets and building enterprise-level projects.

name: The Excel Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery
description: Become a data wizard in Excel. Learn Excel Formulas and Functions, Data Visualization, Pivot Tables, VBA Macros, and much more. Start or supplement your career with data analysis & science skills & get hired in 2024.

name: Advanced Excel Bootcamp: Data Analytics and Business Intelligence
description: Become a Data Professional. You'll learn to master Excel's built-in power tools, including Power Query, Power Pivot Tables, Data Modeling, the DAX formula language, and so much more.

name: VBA Programming for Excel: Zero to Mastery
description: Become a data analytics wizard by using VBA Programming in Excel.

name: Bash Scripting: Learn Shell Scripting
description: Learn Bash Scripting from scratch, from an industry expert. You'll learn Shell Scripting fundamentals plus get the practice and experience to get hired as a DevOps Engineer, SysAdmin, or Network Engineer.

name: DevOps Bootcamp: Terraform
description: Learn Terraform from scratch, from an industry expert. You'll learn Terraform fundamentals all the way to advanced, in-depth expertise so that you go from beginner to being able to get certified as a Terraform Associate!

name: Learning to Learn [Efficient Learning]: Zero to Mastery Blueprint
description: Become an efficient learner and best version of yourself. You'll learn scientifically proven strategies, techniques & skills used by the world's top performers!

name: How to be Happy: Life System Design
description: You will increase your mental game and emotional intelligence for a happier life! This step-by-step guide will teach you 12 new life systems and help you turn them into lasting habits.

name: Learning to Meditate [Productivity & Focus]
description: Learn to meditate from scratch to master your mental game & advance your career. Take the 30 Day Challenge to build a lasting habit that will make you a better candidate, a more productive employee, and a happier person.

name: ZTM Fitness: Get Healthier in 4 Weeks
description: 4-Week Exercise Bootcamp created specifically for programmers & tech workers. In only 4 weeks, you'll build a new habit that will make you healthier, more productive, happier, and help you become a better version of you.

name: SEO Bootcamp: Learn Search Engine Optimization
description: Learn SEO best practices from scratch. Easy to understand and simple, actionable steps to start driving organic search traffic to your website. This is an essential skill to add to your toolkit.

name: Complete Guide to Freelancing in 2024: Zero to Mastery
description: Start a career or earn a side income by becoming a Freelancer. No experience needed. You'll learn the exact steps to get high-paying clients and live your dream life.

name: Consulting: The Complete Freelancer's Guide
description: Use your existing skills to create a career or earn a side income by becoming a Freelance Consultant. You'll learn the exact steps to get high-paying clients and build an exciting career.

name: Testing: The Complete Developer's Guide
description: The most comprehensive, all-in-one software testing course online. Learn unit testing, API backend testing, E2E testing and everything in between using JavaScript, Python, React, Node, Rust, Vue, Angular + more!

name: Deno: The Complete Guide Zero to Mastery
description: Will Deno replace NodeJS?! Probably not, but it will have its place. Ryan Dahl (the creator) made major improvements from Node vs. Deno. This course will teach you everything you need to become a Deno Developer!

name: The Complete Career Toolkit: Personal Branding, Resume Building + more
description: Let's get serious about reaching your career goals. We'll help you set yourself apart from everyone else by building your personal brand + a professional resume, cover letter & portfolio website that make you STAND OUT.

name: Welcome to the Bytes Section!
Future of A.I. & How To Use ChatGPT
description: How to use ChatGPT and other A.I. tools to 10x your productivity and learning efficiency

name: Building AI Apps with the Gemini API
description: Learn to use Google's Gemini API for building AI-powered applications. Plus you'll put your skills into action by building three projects using the Gemini API.

name: Ultimate AWS Bedrock Guide: Build & Scale Generative AI Apps
description: Learn the cutting-edge world of AWS Bedrock and gain skills to create AI apps. You'll build and deploy three AI projects using foundation models from Meta, Anthropic, Cohere, Mistral and more, all from a single API!

name: Building AI Apps with the OpenAI API: GPT, DALL-E & Whisper
description: Learn to use the OpenAI API for chat, image generation, text-to-speech, and speech-to-text so that you can utilize AI technologies in your applications. Plus you'll build an AI application for healthy daily meal plans.

name: Developing LLM Apps with LangChain
description: Learn how to build state-of-the-art LLM-powered applications with LangChain, Pinecone, OpenAI, and Python! We'll build together, step-by-step, line-by-line. This will be a true learning-by-doing experience!

name: Developing LLM App Frontends with Streamlit
description: Learn to use Streamlit to create a frontend for your LLM-powered applications. Streamlit is an open-source Python library that simplifies the creation and sharing of custom frontends for AI applications with the world.

name: Introduction to ChatGPT Code Interpreter
description: Discover the power of ChatGPT's Code Interpreter tool with this byte-sized course, diving into data analysis, machine learning and more, using real-world data.

name: Supercharged Code Editing with Vim and Neovim
description: Learn to use Vim and Neovim with your favorite IDEs. You'll learn all the productivity-boosting shortcuts, macros, and techniques that will give you real mastery of code editing!

name: Introduction to Networking
description: Learn the fundamental principles of networking by gaining insights into the structure and functioning of computer networks. The ideal starting point for individuals with limited or no prior experience in the field

name: AI Coding with GitHub Copilot
description: Learn to use GitHub Copilot, a powerful AI-powered programming partner that helps programmers write code faster and more efficiently

name: AI Coding with Jupyter AI
description: Learn to use Jupyter AI, which adds generative AI capabilities to Jupyter Lab and Jupyter Notebook, the most popular open-source tools for Python programmers, Data Scientists, and AI & Machine Learning Engineers.

name: Introduction to ChatGPT: A Practical Guide
description: Learn how ChatGPT actually works! This course will get you up to speed on how LLMs work under the hood including topics like Prompt Design, Fine-Tuning + more.

name: Artificial Intelligence in Cybersecurity
description: Explore the crucial relationship between artificial intelligence and cybersecurity including vulnerabilities and security risks associated with Large Language Models (LLMs) and machine learning.

name: Enhanced Freelancing with AI
description: Learn to leverage AI to optimize your freelancing profile for visibility, craft personalized and persuasive proposals, and manage projects more efficiently.

name: NFT 101: Introduction to NFTs
description: This introduction to NFTs course will teach you what NFTs are, how to use them & give you a step-by-step guide to create your own NFT and sell it on OpenSea.

name: WebAssembly: A Practical Guide
description: Learn WebAssembly to develop high-performance applications with near-native performance. Take your programming skills to the next level by learning this cutting-edge web technology.

name: Career Advice
description: Ideas, tips, and advice gathered over the years by Andrei Neagoie to help you succeed in your career.

name: Getting Your First Dev Job
description: How to make efficient use of your time and actionable next steps to take so you can get your first dev job as quickly as possible.

name: FAANG Interview Prep 101
description: Get a real, behind the scenes look at the FAANG / Big Tech hiring process and what you'll need to do to get hired at a top tech company.

name: Designer to Developer Handoff: Build a Project from a Design File
description: Knowing how to translate designs and implement them in code is a key skill for developers.

name: Cybersecurity: Personal Online Security
description: Personal online security practices to keep your digital footprint private and secure in the digital age.

name: Principles For Programmers
description: The Condensed Advice From The World's Best Programmers | The Book by @AndreiNeagoie of Zero To Mastery

name: Welcome to the Projects Section!
Conquer JavaScript by Building Your Own Framework from Scratch
description: Understand how JavaScript works at a deeper level, enhance your JavaScript skills, and build an awesome portfolio project in this project-based course!

name: Build a ChatBot with Nuxt, TypeScript and the OpenAI Assistants API
description: Take your skills to the next level and build an AI-powered customer support ChatBot! You'll learn to utilize the OpenAI Assistants API to power a chatbot that's fine-tuned for your specific product or service.

name: Master the Pathfinding Algorithms with JavaScript and React
description: Enhance your JavaScript and React skills, build a portfolio project, and understand the pathfinding algorithms on a deeper level in this project-based course!

name: Build a Notion Clone with React and TypeScript
description: Take your skills to the next level by building a React Typescript project! This course will teach how to use TypeScript with React while building a Notion Clone using best practices.

name: Build an End-to-End Web App from Scratch in AWS
description: Take your AWS skills to the next level and build a portfolio project! This project-based course will guide you through designing and building a web application using five different AWS services.

name: Build a Full-Stack X/Twitter Clone with Rust
description: Take your Rust programming skills to the next level! In this project-based course you'll use Rust for both the frontend and backend to build a fullstack (and full-fledged) Twitter clone.

name: Build an Instagram Filters App with Vue, TypeScript and WebAssembly
description: Take your Vue skills to the next level and build a portfolio project! This course will teach you to build an Instagram filters app using best practices and help you overcome common mistakes made by Vue Developers.

name: Create a Retirement Planning Tool with Excel
description: Learn, build and reinforce your Excel skills with this hands-on project that guides you through the creation of a dynamic and multifaceted retirement planner spreadsheet-based tool!

name: Crack the Frontend Interview with React
description: In this project-based course you'll learn the mental framework needed to breakdown problems you will face in Frontend Engineering interviews by building a straightforward (yet surprisingly complex) Star Rating component.

name: Rank a Website on the First Page of Google with SEO
description: Rank your website on the first page as quickly as possible. Weâ€™ll go through a step-by-step process of identifying low-competition keywords, writing SEO-friendly content, and driving traffic to your site!

name: Design a Responsive Airbnb Website with Figma
description: In this project-based course you'll delve into the realm of advanced Figma features to craft a responsive website for a fictional, AirBnB-like rental service company called "Flexrent".

name: Conduct a Choice-Based Conjoint Analysis for Netflix with Python
description: Delve into real-world market research and data analysis, focusing on consumer behavior for a globally recognized brand, Netflix.

name: Build a Yelp! Clone for Restaurants with Flutter and Dart
description: Build a comprehensive Flutter app for mobile (iOS and Android) and web that allows users to write restaurant reviews including star & price ratings, attaching photos, recording locations, and syncing data via the Cloud!

name: Create a Discord Bot with Node.js
description: Build and reinforce your Node skills by building a Discord Bot that predicts the weather, forecasts astronomical information, and acts as a sandbox to practice everything related to Node and backend programming.

name: Visit Our Virtual Campus
description: Your membership includes access to the private ZTM Campus where we host live events with instructors and students. Stay tuned for monthly campus events and announcements!

name: ZTM Campus Event Recordings
description: Listen to recordings of past Campus events. A great way to keep learning while doing chores or going for a walk!
